missionProperties.missionInfo:
{-} While <color="red">R2-D2</color> or <color="red">C-3PO</color> is defending, if they are not within 4 spaces of a hero, remove 1 die from their defense pool.
{-} Imperial mission tokens represent barricades and traps and are impassable terrain. Tusken Raiders treat Imperial mission tokens as normal terrain. A hero can interact with a token to try and remove it.
{-} Tusken Raiders on the Narrow Path (Twin Shadows tile 05B) are snipers that can target figures on the entire map when instructed.
{-} The door is locked. A figure can attack the door (Health: *1*, Defense: 1 {G}).
{-} The mission will progress when a Rebel figure climbs the Narrow Path (click the green highlight and select "Climb".
{-} The Rebels lose when all heroes are wounded and <color="red">R2-D2</color> and <color="red">C-3PO</color> are defeated.
missionProperties.repositionOverride: Block access to the door and the terminal.

events.eventText:
You rummage through the supplies and take whatever seems useful.

Draw a supply card. You gain 1 medpac. Claim this token.

You rummage through the supplies and take whatever seems useful.

Draw a supply card. You gain 1 medpac. Claim this token.

You rummage through the supplies and take whatever seems useful.

Draw a supply card. You gain 1 medpac. Claim this token.

The rock is unyielding under your feet and the heat from Tatooine’ twin suns is unbearable as you make your climb through the Jundland Wastes. C-3PO mimics your sentiments in a woeful voice: “This is no place for civilized people. We will surely perish out here.”

His counterpart, R2-D2, beeps at him and rolls ahead. You are forced to ignore your discomfort as a blaster bolt zooms by you, fired by the stormtroopers you now see posted ahead. As you move to engage them, you notice a band of Tuskens above you, getting in place to shoot down the canyon as you make the long climb.

{-} Deploy the heroes to the blue highlighted space.

eventActions.tbText:
{-} Heroes control <color="red">R2-D2</color> and <color="red">C-3PO</color> as allies.
{-} While <color="red">R2-D2</color> or <color="red">C-3PO</color> is defending, if they are not within 4 spaces of a hero, remove 1 die from their defense pool.
{-} Imperial mission tokens represent barricades and traps and are impassable terrain. Tusken Raiders treat Imperial mission tokens as normal terrain. A hero can interact with a token to try and remove it.
{-} Tusken Raiders on the Narrow Path (Twin Shadows tile 05B) are snipers that can target figures on the entire map when instructed.
{-} The door is locked. A figure can attack the door (Health: *1*, Defense: 1 {G}).
{-} The mission will progress when a Rebel figure climbs the Narrow Path (click the green highlight and select "Climb".
{-} The Rebels lose when all heroes are wounded and <color="red">R2-D2</color> and <color="red">C-3PO</color> are defeated.

events.eventText: After a grueling climb and heavy combat, you infiltrate the base and steal Imperial plans from the central console, hopefully foiling any Imperial plots. {-} The Rebels win the mission! {-} Heroes receive the "Counterparts" Reward card. (This Reward card works differently when playing with Imperial Commander. Refer to the Rules Change section of the wiki documentation for details.)

eventActions.mainText: Did you play this mission as part of the "Twin Shadows" mini campaign?

events.eventText:
The climbing and battle has pushed you to the edge of your endurance, and you simply have to surrender and turn back. You hope that this base’s purpose is for one of the Empire’ less pernicious operations.

{-} The Rebels lose the mission.

eventActions.mainText: Did you play this mission as part of the "Twin Shadows" mini campaign?

events.eventText:
After your pilot executed a brilliant extraction from your infiltration mission, you regroup on your shuttle and plan your next strategy. The plans you stole indicate that Kayn Somos, the stormtrooper commander you've been encountering, has been leading a recon mission to hunt down the Rebellion’s hero, Luke Skywalker. The operation uses the orbiting Star Destroyer as a hub, and from the looks of things it will be moving out soon, meaning they've found him. The time has come to act.

The plans also include the Star Destroyer’s docking codes. Your pilot tells you they should be enough to get your shuttle past the turbolasers and into the ship's main hangar. After that, figuring out a way to destroy that thing and get out alive will be up to you.

{-} Each hero receives 3 XP.
{-} Heroes receive 300 credits per hero.
{-} Heroes receive <color="red">R2-D2</color> (Loyal Astromech) and <color="red">C-3PO</color> (Human-Cyborg Relations) as allies.
{-} The next active mission is “Fire in the Sky”.

“You sure know how to get yourselves into sticky situations, don’t you?” Your pilot’s snide comments come in on your comlink as he executes a daring extraction to pull you out of the line of fire.

“So still no more info, then? Well, all I've been able to uncover is that, based on some of its readings, that Star Destroyer will be flying to Sullust soon. I don’t know for sure, but I think they may be after Luke. That was the location of his latest mission. They must have been doing recon here.”

Knowing you may have little time to save the Rebellion’s hero, you quickly concoct a scheme to stow aboard an Imperial shuttle and sneak your way onto the Star Destroyer. You're not sure what you'll be able to do once on board, but you hope an opportunity will
present itself.

{-} Each hero receives 2 XP.
{-} Heroes receive 300 credits per hero.
{-} Heroes receive <color="red">R2-D2</color> (Loyal Astromech) and <color="red">C-3PO</color> (Human-Cyborg Relations) as allies.
{-} The next active mission is “Infiltrated”.

{-} Each hero receives 1 XP.
{-} Heroes receive 100 credits per hero.

events.eventName: End of Mission - Rebels lose Round Limit
events.eventText:
The climbing and battle has pushed you to the edge of your endurance, and you simply have to surrender and turn back. You hope that this base’s purpose is for one of the Empire’ less pernicious operations.

{-} The Rebels lose the mission.

eventActions.mainText: Did you play this mission as part of the "Twin Shadows" mini campaign?

events.eventText:
Cool air rushes out of the air-conditioned compound as the door slides open.

{-} A hero can interact with the terminal ({I}) to obtain the plans.
{-} The Rebels win when a hero obtains the plans.

translatedEntityProperties.theText:
The door leads into the Imperial compound.

{-} The door is locked. A figure can attack the door (Health: *1*, Defense: 1 {G}).

eventActions.shortText: Obtain the plans from the terminal.

eventActions.theText:
{-} While <color="red">R2-D2</color> or <color="red">C-3PO</color> is defending, if they are not within 4 spaces of a hero, remove 1 die from their defense pool.
{-} A hero can interact with the terminal ({I}) to obtain the plans.
{-} The Rebels win when a hero obtains the plans.
{-} The Rebels lose when all heroes are wounded and <color="red">R2-D2</color> and <color="red">C-3PO</color> are defeated.

events.eventText:
As you start the climb, the Tusken Raiders grab their gaffi sticks and rush forward to confront you.

{-} The mission will progress when the door to the compound is destroyed.

eventActions.theText:
{-} Heroes control <color="red">R2-D2</color> and <color="red">C-3PO</color> as allies.
{-} While <color="red">R2-D2</color> or <color="red">C-3PO</color> is defending, if they are not within 4 spaces of a hero, remove 1 die from their defense pool.
{-} Imperial mission tokens represent barricades and traps and are impassable terrain. Tusken Raiders treat Imperial mission tokens as normal terrain. A hero can interact with a token to try and remove it.
{-} Tusken Raiders on the Narrow Path (Twin Shadows tile 05B) are snipers that can target figures on the entire map when instructed.
{-} The door is locked. A figure can attack the door (Health: *1*, Defense: 1 {G}).
{-} The mission will progress when the door to the compound is destroyed.
{-} The Rebels lose when all heroes are wounded and <color="red">R2-D2</color> and <color="red">C-3PO</color> are defeated.

translatedEntityProperties.theText:
A winding, narrow path leads along the side of the canyon. It is a long and arduous climb.

{-} The first time a Rebel figure enters the Narrow Path, click "Climb".

eventActions.mainText:
You start to slice into the terminal.

{-} Test {I}. Apply +1 {B} for each strain token on the terminal, then discard all strain tokens on the terminal. Enter the number of successes below.

inputList.theText:
The security systems hold. You need to keep trying.

{-} Place 1 strain token on the terminal for each {B} result gained.

events.eventText:
The heat from Tatooine's twin suns is merciless. You feel it draining your strength.

{-} Each hero tests {K}. Each hero who fails becomes <color="red">Weakened</color>.
The gate finally gives in and slides open. At the same time, alarms start blaring through the desert heat.

translatedEntityProperties.theText:
The Empire has erected a fence here, featuring a complicated lock.

{-} A hero can interact with the fence to try and pick the lock.

The Empire has erected a fence here, featuring a complicated lock.

{-} A hero can interact with the fence to try and pick the lock.

eventActions.mainText:
You try to pick the lock on the gate.

{-} Test {I}. Apply +1 {B} for each strain token on the yellow mission tokens, then discard all strain tokens on the yellow mission tokens. Enter the number of successes below.

inputList.theText:
You make some progress, but the lock holds. You need to keep trying.

{-} Place 1 strain token on the yellow mission tokens for each {B} result gained.

eventActions.mainText:
You start to pull away the rocks.

{-} Test {K}. Apply +1 {B} for each strain token on the green mission tokens, then discard all strain tokens on the green mission tokens. Enter the number of successes below.

inputList.theText:
You make some progress, but there is still some work before you. You need to keep trying.

{-} Place 1 strain token on the green mission tokens for each {B} result gained.

events.eventText: You finally manage to clear a path forward.

translatedEntityProperties.theText:
The Tusken Raiders have triggered a rockfall. Huge rocks are blocking the way.

{-} Imperial mission tokens are impassable terrain. Tusken Raiders treat Imperial mission tokens as normal terrain.
{-} A hero can interact with the rocks to try and remove them.

eventActions.mainText:
You try to carefully weave through the triggers.

{-} Test {J}. Apply +1 {B} for each strain token on the red mission token, then discard all strain tokens on the red mission token. Enter the number of successes below.

inputList.theText:
A charge detonates close to you, sending razor-sharp shards flying.

{-} You suffer 2 {H} and become <color="red">Bleeding</color>.
You make your way safely across and disarm the traps.

events.eventText: As you approach the base, a stormtrooper commander strides out, shouting to his troops: “Fight harder, fools! We cannot let this Rebel slime undo all we've done!”

translatedEntityProperties.theText:
The Empire has rigged the Narrow Path with mines and other traps.

{-} Imperial mission tokens are impassable terrain. Tusken Raiders treat Imperial mission tokens as normal terrain.
{-} A hero can interact with the traps to try and remove them.

eventActions.mainText:

initialGroups.customInstructions: {Q}{A} Perform a ranged attack using 2 blue dice targeting {rebel}, requiring 8 accuracy. During this attack, you have line of sight to any figure on an exterior space. This attack gains {B}: +2 Accuracy. You cannot use other abilities during this attack.
